Package com.cognizant.repository

Interface ClaimDetailsRepo

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<ClaimDetails,String>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<ClaimDetails,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<ClaimDetails,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<ClaimDetails,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<ClaimDetails,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<ClaimDetails>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<ClaimDetails,String>
@Repository public interface ClaimDetailsRepo extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<ClaimDetails,String>

  • Method Details

    • findByPolicyNoAndDateOfAccidentYear

      @Query("SELECT cd FROM ClaimDetails cd JOIN cd.policy p WHERE p.policyNo = :policyId AND YEAR(cd.dateOfAccident) = :year") List<ClaimDetails> findByPolicyNoAndDateOfAccidentYear(@Param("policyId") String policyId, @Param("year") int year)

    • countByClaimStatusAndDateOfAccidentYearMonth

      @Query("SELECT COUNT(cd) FROM ClaimDetails cd WHERE cd.claimStatus = :claimStatus AND YEAR(cd.dateOfAccident) = :year AND MONTH(cd.dateOfAccident) = :month") int countByClaimStatusAndDateOfAccidentYearMonth(@Param("claimStatus") boolean claimStatus, @Param("year") int year, @Param("month") int month)

    • sumAmtApprovedBySurveyorByClaimStatusAndDateOfAccidentYearMonth

      @Query("SELECT SUM(cd.amtApprovedBySurveyor) FROM ClaimDetails cd WHERE cd.claimStatus = :claimStatus AND YEAR(cd.dateOfAccident) = :year AND MONTH(cd.dateOfAccident) = :month") double sumAmtApprovedBySurveyorByClaimStatusAndDateOfAccidentYearMonth(@Param("claimStatus") boolean claimStatus, @Param("year") int year, @Param("month") int month)

    • findByEstimatedLoss

      List<ClaimDetails> findByEstimatedLoss(int estimatedLoss)
